content.raw:
How about common and transport? Rendering is coming up soon too...

I have mixed feelings about this, now every tiny change from these dependencies which GUI depends on will require a release. Since GUI is in such an early stage, I worry this may happen too often.

But I don't know, maybe it's not such an early stage anymore...
